Description: Primary key identifier for the stoplight indicator
Code identifier for the indicator
Data Quality Checks: NOT NULL, Alphanumeric, Lowercase, No spaces

Description: Short display name for the indicator
The question text displayed for this indicator
Sample Values: What is your family's income level?

Description: Detailed definition of the indicator
Sample Values: The amount of money earned by the family monthly

Description: Current status of the indicator
Language code for the indicator content
Data Quality Checks: ISO language code format, Length check (2-5)

Description: Country code the indicator is applicable to
Data Quality Checks: ISO country code format, Length check (2)

Description: Unit of measurement for the indicator
Data Quality Checks: Enumeration check for standard units, Length check (max 20)

Description: Tag for categorization
JSON array of applicable zones/regions
JSON array of targets for the indicator
PII: Valid JSON array, Enumeration check for values

Description: Reference to the dimension the indicator belongs to
Indicates if the indicator has been verified/approved
Additional description or context for the indicator
Sample Values: This indicator measures the family's monthly income level

Description: Type of stoplight methodology used
Unix timestamp of creation date
Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future

Description: User who created the indicator
Unix timestamp of last update
User who last updated the indicator
Legacy ID reference from DynamoDB
Indicates if this is a generic indicator that can be used globally
